TopicTitle: Dilbert Kerman's Custom-Made Pod & Can Shoppe

Articles.Content:
Ever thought that your pods should be able to do more than just carry kerbals?

Well now they can!

 

The Brilliant and Renowned inventor Dilbert Kerman has discovered a way to create super-useful pods, capable of things that normally would require a whole rocket!

Any parts you want(That are one size smaller than your requested Pod) in any configuration you want!

NOTE: These Pods are a bit heavier (depending on your selection) than normal Pods, so build your launchers accordingly!

 

ALL REQUESTS MUST INCLUDE:

  1. Pod/Lander Can you wish to use
  2. Other functions you want the pod to perform(internal rockets, extreme mono storage, etc.)
  3. Specifics(If required)

 

ORDER YOURS TODAY!!!

 

Edited February 2, 2017 by whitejj01
